accepted_if: Pono e ʻae ʻia ka :attribute inā ʻo :other ka :value.
after: Pono ka lā :attribute ma hope o :date.
after_or_equal: Pono ka lā :attribute ma hope a i ʻole like me :date.
alpha: Pono ka :attribute i nā leka wale nō.
alpha_dash: Pono ka :attribute i nā leka, nā helu, nā kaha a me nā kaha lalo.
alpha_num: Pono ka :attribute i nā leka a me nā helu wale nō.
ascii: Pono e loaʻa i ka māla :attribute nā huaʻōlelo alphanumeric a me nā hōʻailona hoʻokahi-byte.
before: Pono ka lā :attribute ma mua o ka :date.
before_or_equal: Pono ka lā :attribute ma mua a i ʻole like me :date.

between.string: Pono ka :attribute ma waena o :min a :max mau huapalapala.

can: Loaʻa i ka māla :attribute kahi waiwai ʻae ʻole.
contains: The :attribute field is missing a required value.
date_equals: Pono ka lā :attribute e like me :date.
date_format: ʻAʻole kūlike ka :attribute i ka format :format.
decimal: Pono ke kahua :attribute he :decimal mau wahi decimal.
declined_if: Pono e hōʻole ʻia ka :attribute inā he :value ka :other.
different: Pono ʻokoʻa ka :attribute a me ka :other.
digits_between: Pono ka :attribute ma waena o :min a :max mau huahelu.
dimensions: Loaʻa i ka :attribute nā ana kiʻi kūpono ʻole.
distinct: Loaʻa i ke kahua :attribute kahi waiwai pālua.
doesnt_end_with: ʻAʻole pono e pau ka māla :attribute me kekahi o kēia mau mea: :values.

email: Pono ka helu :attribute he leka uila kūpono.
ends_with: Pono e pau ka :attribute me kekahi o kēia mau mea: :values.
enum: He kūpono ʻole ka :attribute i koho ʻia.

in: He kūpono ʻole ka :attribute i koho ʻia.

password.uncompromised: Ua ʻike ʻia ka :attribute i hāʻawi ʻia i kahi leak data. E ʻoluʻolu e koho i kahi :attribute ʻokoʻa.

starts_with: Pono e hoʻomaka ka :attribute me kekahi o kēia mau mea: :values.
